data.quote: No matter how bad things are, you can always make things worse.
data.author: Randy Pausch, The Last Lecture

data.quote: You need to spend time crawling alone through shadows to truly appreciate what it is to stand in the sun.
data.author: Shaun Hick

data.quote: Your friends will believe in your potential, your enemies will make you live up to it.
data.author: Tim Fargo

data.quote: Nothing ever goes away until it teaches us what we need to know
data.author: Pema Chodron

data.quote: Thankfully, persistence is a great substitute for talent.
data.author: Steve Martin

data.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: The greatest joys in life are found not only in what we do and feel, but also in our quiet hopes and labors for others.
data.author: Bryant McGill

data.quote: Karma said sometimes you have to suffer in life, not because you were bad, but because you didn't realize where and when to stop being good.
data.author: Scrawled Diary
